snippet.title: Super Freaks 1 Ultimate Edition DEMO 3.1/SAGE 2022 DEMO PLAYTHROUGH [Download Link in Description]
snippet.description:
Download (Windows Only): https://superfreaksdev.itch.io/super-freaks-1-ultimate-edition

I've patched a few things just in time for SAGE! Let's go over them:

1. You no longer uncurl after hitting an enemy (I'm happy about this too)
2. Boss fights are much quicker paced
3. You can no longer softlock by flinging yourself off the top of the screen in co-op
4. When remapping an action in the controls menu, you now have a few seconds to do so before it automatically closes.
5. Switch Pro Controller icons are in, though be warned--for some reason, and I'm not sure how to fix this, Share and Home are considered Start and Select by Game Maker. I've thought about replacing the control scheme system with the fantastic Input (found here: https://jujuadams.itch.io/input) which I did not realize existed when coding my own controls, but currently I have no time to do so. The current system at least supports most controllers good enough, especially Xbox and PS4, which is likely what you're going to be using.
